Page QRCode æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ Safari æµè§ˆå™¨æ‰©å±•ï¼Œ ç”¨äºç”Ÿæˆç½‘é¡µåœ°å€çš„ QRCodeï¼Œ ä»è€Œæ–¹ä¾¿ç”¨æˆ·å°†ç½‘é¡µåœ°å€ä»¥å›¾ç‰‡çš„å½¢å¼è¿›è¡Œåˆ†äº«

Page QRCode is a Safari browser extension, it used to generate QRCode of webpage address for easily share with image.

å®‰è£… Installing

  1. é¦–å…ˆæ‰“å¼€ Safari æµè§ˆå™¨

    Open Safari Browser

  2. ä»èœå• â€œSafariæµè§ˆå™¨â€ ä¸­é€‰æ‹© â€œSafari æµè§ˆå™¨æ‰©å±•...â€ï¼Œè¿™å°†è‡ªåŠ¨æ‰“å¼€ App Store ç¨‹åºå¹¶è¿›å…¥ â€œSafari æµè§ˆå™¨æ‰©å±•â€ åˆ†ç±»

    Choose the item "Safari browser extension..." from the menu of Safari browser and the App Store will open the "Safari browser extension" category page.

  3. æ‰¾åˆ° â€œPage QRCodeâ€ å³å¯è¿›è¡Œè´­ä¹°å®‰è£….

    Find out "Page QRCode" and install.

åé¦ˆé—®é¢˜ Consultation and suggest

å¦‚æœæ‚¨æƒ³å’¨è¯¢æœ‰å…³ Page QRCode çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œè¯·é‚®ä»¶æˆ‘ zhongxingdou@gmail.comã€‚è°¢è°¢ã€‚

Welcome to send email (zhongxingdou@gmail.com) to me for any question or suggest about the Page QRCode extension. Thank you.

â€‹	favorites: [Favorite!]

è¾“å…¥ç±»å‹

æ ‡é‡

scalar DateTime

å®ç°æ ‡é‡

new GraphQLScalarType {
    name: 'DateTime',
    description: 'A valid date time value.'

    parseValue: value => new Date(value),                  // æŸ¥è¯¢å˜é‡çš„å€¼å°†ç”¨å®ƒè½¬æ¢
    serialize: value => new Date(value).toISOString(),   // ç¡®ä¿è¿”å›å€¼æœ‰ç»Ÿä¸€çš„æ ¼å¼

}

â€‹	aliasName: name
â€‹	friends(genderParam: FEMALE) {
â€‹		name

â€‹	}

â€‹	...on work {
â€‹		position
â€‹		office
â€‹	},

å˜æ›´ mutation

}

entry.title: Sequelize å…³ç³»æ˜ å°„
entry.content:
belongsTo

 models.Page.belongsTo(models.User, {
    as: 'createUser',
    foreignKey: 'creator',
});

models.Page.belongsTo(models.User, {
    as: 'operateUser',
    foreignKey: 'operator'
});

models.Page.findOne({
    where: {id: 1}, 
    include: 'createUser'
}).then(p => console.log(p.createUser.name))

 models.Page.findOne({where: {id: 1}, include: 'createUser'}).then(p => console.log(p.toJSON()))

 { seo: null,
  style: null,
  props: null,
  id: 1,
  title: 'test1',
  description: 'test1 desc',
  creator: 1,
  operator: null,
  createdAt: 2020-04-30T11:50:14.586Z,
  updatedAt: 2020-04-30T11:50:14.586Z,
  createUser:
   { id: 1,
     name: 'liuxing',
     email: 'zhongxingdou@gmail.com',
     password:
      '14ff096758d8b24276d9ed28088fbf9ff963c5109e7150118f3b6243a1b54874',
     createdAt: 2020-04-27T02:44:49.848Z,
     updatedAt: 2020-04-27T02:44:49.848Z } }

models.Page.findAll({include: 'createUser'})
.then(ps => console.log(ps[0].createUser.name))
